Address: 25 de Mayo 555 F5310ACK AimogastaLa Rioja
Description:
Featuring a garden with an outdoor swimming pool, Hotel del Centro offers comfortable rooms in Aimogasta. Free WiFi access is available in this hotel. A daily breakfast is provided.

With a simple style, each room at Hotel del Centro is equipped with air conditioning, heating, a work desk and a cable TV. Bathrooms include hairdryers, and some rooms also offer a minibar.

Other facilities available at Hotel del Centro include a restaurant, a bar and a 24-hour front desk. Laundry and ironing services can be requested for a surcharge.

Hotel del Centro offers free parking.

Address: Los Terebintos Avenue Castro Barros5301 Anillaco
Description:
Hosteria Anillaco in Anillaco features 2-star accommodation with a shared lounge, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Each room is equipped with a balcony.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Hosteria Anillaco provides certain rooms that include mountain views, and each room has a private bathroom with a bidet. All units feature a wardrobe.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The nearest airport is La Rioja Airport, 101 km from Hosteria Anillaco.

Address: Av. Roca 374
Description:
SanPier - Alquileres Temporarios is a self-catering accommodation in Allen. The property is 200 metres from San Martin Square and 300 metres from Santa Catalina church. Free WiFi access is available in some rooms.

Apartments at SanPier are styled in cream-coloured hues and feature modern décor. All of them are fitted with balconies overlooking the city, full kitchen facilities and comfortable living rooms. Each accommodation includes a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom, completed with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bidet.

Guests staying  at SanPier - Alquileres Temporarios can unwind in the terrace. Housekeeping services are offered.

The apartment is 600 metres from Bus Terminal and 28 km from Aeropuerto Internacional Presidente Perón Airport. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Set in Almafuerte, Hotel de la Plaza provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. All rooms boast a TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy garden views.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe.

Santa Rosa de Calamuchita is 44 km from Hotel de la Plaza, while Villa Rumipal is 32 km from the property.

Address: Tucuman 1612
Description:
Boasting a swimming pool, a garden, a restaurant and views of the garden, La Francisca is situated in Almafuerte and features accommodation with free WiFi.

The apartment provides guests with a patio, mountain views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

If you would like to discover the area, diving and fishing are possible in the surroundings and La Francisca can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Embalse Rio Tercero is 24 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Ingeniero Aeronáutico Ambrosio L.V. Taravella International Airport, 115 km from La Francisca. Managed by a private host

Address: Los Espinillos y Las Glicinas Potrero de GarayCórdoba
Attractions: City centre : 3000mts Nearest Bus / Metro Stop : 80000mts
Description:
HotelDescription#The hotel is located in Potrero de Garay, in an extraordinary location. Nearby are attractions such as The Reatres, Villa General Belgrano, Villa City of America and Alta Gracia, Cordoba.

The 5-room city hotel offers peace and contact with nature and has a range of services including a maid service, linens, dishes, towels for the swimming pool and solarium, a park and a playground. Further facilities available to guests include a restaurant, WLAN Internet access and a bike hire service. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park.

The hotel offers comfortable, clean and fully equipped guest rooms featuring a terrace with excellent views of the Sierras Grandes and the lake. In addition to a private bathroom with a shower and bathtub, accommodation units come with such amenities as a television, Internet access and a kitchenette with an oven and microwave. Other standard features of accommodation units include a double bed and individually regulated heating.

There is an outdoor swimming pool in the hotel grounds with parasols laid out for use by the water's edge. Furthermore, guests can enjoy recreational activities outside the hotel, such as lake and river fishing and a range of water sports.

Breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

Address: Bv. Pellegrini 797 Alta GraciaCórdoba
Description:
Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a spa, a restaurant, and a fitness centre, Solares Hotel & Spa offers free Wi-Fi and buffet breakfast in Alta Gracia.

Providing a tranquil environment, the rooms in Solares Hotel & Spa feature private bathrooms and cable TVs. Room service is available and laundry services can be arranged upon request.

Guests at Solares Hotel & Spa can arrange bicycle rentals and tours at the hotel. Free tickets to the Che museum and Manuel de Falla, located 300 metres away, are provided.

Drinks and snacks can be ordered at the on-site bar and Leyendas Sports Bar restaurant offers regional and international dishes.

Solares Hotel & Spa  is 500 metres from the shopping centre and 200 metres from Alta Gracia golf club. Ingeniero Ambrosio Tavarella International Airport is 50 km from the property. Free private parking is possible on site. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This accommodation is registered as a provider of the Pre Trip Program (Programa Previaje) of the Argentinian Ministry of Tourism and Sports(CUIT: 30715948253)

Please note that all gust must provide their DNI, and if they were under age, must have an authorization of their parents.
Please note the based on local tax laws, all Argentinian citizens and resident foreigners must pay an additional fee (VAT) of 21%. Only foreigners who pay with a foreign credit card, debit card or via bank transfer are exempt from this 21% additional fee (VAT) in accommodation and breakfast when presenting a foreign passport or a foreign ID along with a supporting document handed by the national migrations authority, if applicable.

At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a mountain view. All rooms have a safety deposit box.

Guests at Howard Johnson Sierras Hotel y Casino Alta Gracia can enjoy a continental breakfast.

You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel.

The reception at the accommodation can provide tips on the area.

Surrounded by a large parkland with native vegetation, Del Sol a la Montaña EcoLodge - Turismo Consciente offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi access. The property has an outdoor swimming pool and barbecue facilities. A daily breakfast is included.

Apartments at Del Sol a la Montaña EcoLodge - Turismo Consciente feature air conditioning, heating, kitchen facilities, a seating area and a complete bathroom, including a bidet and free toiletries. All of them have lovely views of the garden and mountains. Bed linens are included.

A wide variety of activities can be enjoyed in this property, including meditation. Other activities available in the area include massage treatments.

Del Sol a la Montaña EcoLodge - Turismo Consciente has 24-hour front desk assistance and a shared lounge are offered. It is located in front of the lake, only 300 metres from the river.

Complejo Soles Blancos has comfortable apartments with chic summer style décor, kitchen facilities, cable TV and seating areas. All apartments feature minibars and private bathrooms with showers.

Built in 1927 and boasting an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Hotel El Potrerillo de Larreta offers accommodations inside a private neighborhood in Alta Gracia. The property is surrounded by an 18 hole golf course and free WiFi access is available. Virgen de Lourdes Sanctuary is 3 km away.

Each of the elegant rooms at El Potrerillo de Larreta features air conditioning, views of the mountain and a complete bahtroom with a bath tub. They are fitted with a flat screen cable TV and a safety deposit box.

Hotel El Potrerillo de Larreta offers guests a solarium, a chapel and a garden. Meeting and banquet facilities are also available, as well as free bicycles. An array of activities can be enjoyed in the surroundings, including tennis. Other services provided by the inn include a tour desk and an on site shop. The inn offers free parking and a daily breakfast is served.

Alta Gracia,  Plaza Principal Manuel Solares Square and Liniers Museum are 8km away. Boasting an outdoor pool in a well-kept garden in Alta Gracia, Raices del Carolino - Suites de Altagracia provides free Wi-Fi and continental breakfast. The Gabriel Dubois Art Museum showcases the work of the French-born sculptor Gabriel Simmonet, just 300 metres from the property.

The guest rooms are decorated in warm colours and a regional design, with crafted wooden features and furniture. Each provides you with a private bathroom with hairdryer, flat-screen cable TV and air conditioning. There is also a minibar, a desk and safety deposit box.

At Raices del Carolino - Suites de Altagracia you can make the most of the BBQ facilities. There is 24-hour front desk assistance and a sun terrace. Luggage storage and room service are possible.

Set in Alta Gracia, 36 km from City Hall, La Posada offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Each room includes a patio with lake views.

At the inn every room includes air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a city view. At La Posada every room is fitted with a seating area.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast.

Located 23 km from Manuel de Falla Museum, Cabaña Los Espinillos de San Isidro provides accommodation in José de la Quintana with access to a hot tub. This country house features a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking.

This country house will provide guests with a satellite flat-screen TV, a patio, a seating area and a computer. The kitchen comes with a fridge, an oven and a microwave and there is bidet with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

An American breakfast is available daily at the country house.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

There is an outdoor swimming pool and a sun terrace at this property and guests can go fishing and cycling nearby.

House of Che Guevara Museum is 24 km from Cabaña Los Espinillos de San Isidro. The nearest airport is Ingeniero Aeronáutico Ambrosio L.V. Taravella International Airport, 70 km from the accommodation. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Cabaña Los Espinillos de San Isidro in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.

Address: Av. Los Naranjos
Description:
Situated in Villa Anizacate in the Córdoba Province region and City Hall reachable within 43 km, Cabanas Villa Nazaret features accommodation with free WiFi, a childrens playground, an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet, shower and a hairdryer, while the kitchen has a fridge, an oven and a microwave. A patio with pool views is offered in all units.

The lodge features a barbecue and a garden, which can be enjoyed by guests if the weather permits.

Uruguay Bridge is 43 km from Cabanas Villa Nazaret, while Cuckoo Clock is 44 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ingeniero Aeronáutico Ambrosio L.V. Taravella International Airport, 62 km from the accommodation. Please inform Cabanas Villa Nazaret in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Managed by a private host
